mapper.select: SELECT calendar_id AS calendarId, created_by AS createdBy, title, description, start_at AS start, end_at AS end, calendar_type AS type, color, created_at AS createdAt, updated_at AS updatedAt FROM calendar WHERE created_by = #{userId} ORDER BY start_at ASC

SELECT calendar_id AS calendarId, created_by AS createdBy, title, description, start_at AS start, end_at AS end, calendar_type AS type, color, created_at AS createdAt, updated_at AS updatedAt FROM calendar WHERE calendar_id = #{calendarId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO calendar (created_by, title, description, start_at, end_at, calendar_type, color) VALUES (#{createdBy}, #{title}, #{description}, #{start}, #{end}, #{type}, #{color})
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT s.schedule_id AS id, s.title, s.description, s.start_at AS start, s.end_at AS end, s.type, 'SCHEDULE' AS source, s.event_type, s.location, s.status FROM schedule s JOIN schedule_participant sp ON s.schedule_id = sp.schedule_id WHERE sp.user_id = #{userId}
